Lesson 4

Objective

Maneuvering the Linkbot will require that you be able to back up a distance at least the length of the wheel base of the Linkbot. This allows you to safely turn around to avoid a barrier. 

#!/usr/bin/env python
# File: ch3lesson4.py

import linkbot

# Change the robot ID shown below to the ID of your Linkbot.
robot = linkbot.Linkbot('')

robot.setJointSpeeds(45, 0, 45)
robot.move(-190, 0, 190)

Explore

See how far you can get the Linkbot to reverse and travel a straight line. Does the speed affect how straight the Linkbot will travel.
